name: risk-mgt-network
description: Central Risk Book on a Distributed Ledger

scripts.deployNetwork: composer archive create --sourceName risk-mgt-network --sourceType module --archiveFile risk-mgt-network.bna &&  composer network deploy -p hlfv1 --archiveFile risk-mgt-network.bna  --enrollId PeerAdmin --enrollSecret adminpw && composer network list -n digitalproperty-network --enrollId admin --enrollSecret adminpw -p hlfv1
scripts.updateNetwork: composer archive create --sourceName risk-mgt-network --sourceType module --archiveFile risk-mgt-network.bna &&  composer network update -p hlfv1 --archiveFile risk-mgt-network.bna  --enrollId admin --enrollSecret adminpw && composer network list -n digitalproperty-network --enrollId admin --enrollSecret adminpw -p hlfv1

author: Ryan Hendricks
